Translations.Text: Sapatha ahe pratahkalaci
Ani daha ratrinci
Ani sama ani visama sankhyeci
Ani ratrici jevha ti nighu lagavi
Kaya yata bud'dhimanansathi puresi sapatha ahe
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane adacya lokansi kaya vyavahara kela
Mothamothe khamba banavinarya iramasi
Jyancyasarakha (konatahi janasamuha) an'ya bhubhagata nirmana kela gela nahi
Ani samudacya lokansi, jyanni darya-khoryata mothamothe pasana korale hote
Ani phira'aunasi, jo mekha balaganara hota
Ya sarvanni dharativara upadrava pasaravila hota
Ani khupa utpata (phasada) majavila hota
Sevati tumacya palanakartyane ya sarvanvara azabaca asuda barasavila
Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta laksa thevuna ahe
Manasa (ci hi dasa ahe ki) jevha tyaca palanakarta tyaci pariksa gheto, ani tyala mana pratistha va krpa denagya pradana karato tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane mala sanmanita kele
Ani jevha to (allaha) yaci kasoti gheto, tyaci ajivika tanga (kami) karuna takato, tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane majhi avhelana keli (ani mala apamanita kele)
Ase mulica nahi kimbahuna (khari gosta asi) ki tumhi loka anathaca mana-sanmana rakhata nahi
Ani garibanna jevu ghalanyace ekamekanna protsahana deta nahi
Ani (melelyanci) varasa sampatti gola karuna khatata
Ani dhana-sampattisi jivanapada prema rakhata
Nihsansaya, jaminila jevha kuthuna kuthuna tila agadi sapata kele ja'ila
Ani tumaca palanakarta (svatah) prakata ho'ila ani phariste ranga bandhuna (yetila)
Ani jya divasi jahannamalahi anale ja'ila tya divasi manusa bodha grahana karila. Parantu ata tyacya bodha grahana karanyaca kaya labha
